title: 411 on intern???
content: So who's the lucky person? (or is the position still open?) inquiring minds want to know! ;^)
author: pablohoney77

comments.content: felicitations, zara! hope you're having fun as the new team member.

Hints:   
   
She registered on Typophile in September 2003.   
She's posted 33 messages here.
Impressive. You really ought to participate in the Type-ID boards ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018115121im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Way to go, Zara. Good luck with the move and looking forward to working with you and the J-boyz on TypeCon festivities. See you in SF!
